      • returnValuesOfColumns

        public static java.util.LinkedList returnValuesOfColumns(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                         java.lang.String uniqueColumn,
                                                         java.lang.String uniqueValue,
                                                         java.lang.String[] columns)
                                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Searches for a specific row using unique values and returns its values as a list.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table to look into.
        uniqueColumn - Name of the column that contains a unique value.
        uniqueValue - Unique value to match the row to.
        columns - List of columns our table has.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of values from a row that matches our unique value.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQLException.
